Diese Karte zeigt alle Artikel der deuts.EN-GB: This map shows all articles in the German-language Wikipedia that are linked to geodata and are located in this area.Colour and size correspond to the number of views in the last 30 days.Click on a point to see a preview of the article. The histogram at the top right shows the distribution of the call statistics for all currently displayed and allows you to filter by frequency of views.

Die API der Wikipedia ist in der Bandbre.EN-GB:
The Wikipedia API is limited in bandwidth
and only allows the retrieval of articles within a radius of 10 km or a
a maximum of 500 articles per call.
